The lotion works really well, and my skin (legs/arms) feels great after applying the moisturizer. I‚Äôm sold on the scent though. It‚Äôs strong at first but drys down to be a light, aromatic fragrance. It doesn‚Äôt last all day sadly, but I would buy a perfume with this fragrance profile.

title: In Love
body: I just received this lotion and used it for the first time and absolutely love it. I love anything pine scented. It's hard to find pine scents so I was so excited to come across this by accident. I see a lot of people buying products from Garden of Joseon so I already trusted them as being really good quality. If you love pine scents, you have to try this. The cream itself is so silky. It feels amazing on my arm. So happy I came across this!

title: Deeply moisturizes
body:
This cream is lightweight and creamy. It gets absorbed into the skin quickly, leaving the skin feeling soft and silky.

Deeply moisturizes my hands while getting rid of the skin fissures and dryness due to winter weather and over washing.

It does have an overpowering musky scent that I really don't like and it lingers for a long time even after washing the hands multiple times. I've realized it's the strong scent of pine.

Now let's talk about the packaging. The pump does not have an arrow like a standard pump does showing which way to turn to open and close so you're left turning both ways hoping that the pump pops up. It took about 5 minutes of turning to finally figure out that you have to push in the middle of the pump to make it pop up! You'd think for the price that you pay for such a small bottle that they would at least add that to the pump.

title: amazing!!!
body: I would give it a thousand stars if I could. Best lotion ever! It leaves my skin sooooo beautiful!!!

title: This product is amazing!!
body: I paired this with the pine body wash and the two together are simply miracle workers for skin. The scent isn‚Äôt overwhelming and a small amount of the lotion goes a long way. I noticed immediate difference in the moisture of my skin.

title: Opini√≥n
body: Be more careful with the product since it arrived with blows and spilled.

title: Pump difficult to open. Extreme floral pine fragrance. Is moisturizing.
body:
This review is for Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove : Body Cream (400ml, 13.5 fl.oz)

Very fragrant floral pine scent. The cream is thick and comes in a pump bottle. It is moisturizing, but personally I'm not a huge fan of the pine scent. Fragrance wise it is so strong that it can double as perfume if you put some on your wrist or your neck area.

I had a hard time with the pump when I tried to loosen it. I turned it so many times and it wouldn't come up. Eventually I turned it while pulling up and it seemed to work. Don't ask me which way I turned it tho lol.

It is a nice and thick body cream that does moisturize the body, however, due to the extreme scent, it's not for me. But if you like the floral pine scent and don't mind the fragrance, I say try it out!

title: Very nice (but expensive) moisturizer
body:
This is some nice, good quality, moisturizer. Not too thick, not too thin. Smells nice. Fragrance is almost the most important thing to me. The description of the scent is accurate - like walking through a cool pine forest with a hint of floral notes... It's subtle and suitable for men and women. It goes on smooth and absorbs well. It's not sticky but my skin feels hydrated.
The issue that took one star away from the rating is the price. Many moisturizers can do the job for a fraction of the price. $25,....really!? I admit I'll miss it when I run out because I love the fragrance, but I wouldn't purchase another bottle. It claims to have anti-aging benefits if used over a long period of time, but who has time for that?

title: Lovely, clean fragrance.
body:
I don't know if I can really speak tot he anti-aging part of the claims in the product, but overall this is a really lovely body cream. It's not sticky, absorbs well into the skin. The texture is pretty thick, so applied out of the shower it really helps as an occlusive to keep in moisture. The ingredients include shea, olive oils, my fav propanediol, a bunch of just really nice hydrating products. The formulation overall looks really clean.

I love this fragrance. It isn't max pine-y, it's really a nicely accessible clean scent. Not too strong, but pleasant powdery... it's difficult to really describe. The listing for the associated perfume shows:

TOP : Bergamot / Pine / Leafy Green / Eucalyptus
MIDDLE : Iris / Lavender / Lotus / Rosemary
BASE : Sandalwood / Patchouli / Cedarwood / Musk

I don't have the perfume to speak of how similar they are., but iris would certainly explain the powder. I don't get a strong read on patchouli here, which I am one of those people pretty sensitive to it if it's not well blended. I love this. I'm a huge fan of this scent. Overall this is really nicely done, a well-executed product, I'll definitely be trying the body wash. Maybe the perfume.

title: Fresh pine scent
body: This body cream has a nice pine scent which is a bit earthy and floral; I enjoyed it although I can imagine that not everyone would. It has a nice moisturizing effect without being too thick or heavy and absorbs easily into the skin. My sensitive skin hasn't had any issues after using it for a few days. It has nice packaging that feels high-end like most other Korean skin products. Overall, I think this is a high quality moisturizing lotion although I admit that it is a bit expensive.

title: Just slightly scented but nice thickness
body: Overall Im fairly happy with this lotion but I do wish the scent was a bit stronger. It was easy to pump and fairly thick but not greasy.

title: It is moisturizing
body: I am a body cream/hand lotionaholic. This body cream is a good size bottle. It is definitely moisturizing, and it isn‚Äôt super heavy, which I like. I‚Äôm not sure I care for the pine w/flower scent, but that‚Äôs a personal thing so I don‚Äôt hold it against the product. I think it‚Äôs a good lotion, but I will give it to a family member who cares for the scent more than I do.

title: Moisturizing
body:
This is a moisturizing lotion, absorbs quickly and does not feel greasy. I have been happy with the performance of the product. The package looks and feels high-end.
I am sensitive to scent- and this is very heavily scented. I can't quite place the scent- it is piney and floral- an unusual combination. I am sure that many would find this scent appealing, but it just not is for me.

title: Scent is nice, lotion moisturizing
body: I like this because it's a very creamy lotion that moisturizes well without leaving my skin feeling greasy. The pine scent is not overpowering but very light. It doesn't seem to linger on my hands for more than 5 minutes or so. I haven't had any irritation from this. It works well for my dry skin.

title: Moisturizing. Good body cream.
body: I like this body cream. It is easy to apply, steadily absorbed and it works well in moisturizing your skin and make your skin feel soft, smooth and hydrated. This body lotion has a unique pleasant scent with a woody notes that is quite different from other typical lotion scents. The scent is relaxing and refreshing. Overall, this is a good body cream lotion for daily use.

title: Lovely Lotion
body: Very nice and light body lotion. The smell is very clean and pleasant. The pump doesn't work on my bottle but I still love this lotion.

title: Pretty good overall
body: This body cream has a pretty good texture and the scent is nice overall. My husband also likes it a lot and reports it pairs well with his cologne and various body sprays.

title: Refreshing pine scented lotion
body:
The Beauty of Joseon's Pine Grove Body Cream is a white medium-weight lotion.
Goes on smoothly and is absorbed promptly by the skin.
It has a unique, refreshing, warm pine scent that is faintly floral, and moisturizes the skin quite well.

title: Smells amazing!
body: Took a few minutes to figure out how to open this. But... when I got it open, I was not disappointed! It smells AMAZING and reminds me of home. Very hydrating without feeling greasy. No irritation. I'm very happy with this!

title: Underwhelming scent
body:
I was really expecting this to be more strongly scented. It's very subtle, but what I can smell is gorgeous. I just wish it was stronger.
My daughter loves it- she swiped it from me. Nice lotion though- very moisturizing.

title: Nice enough
body: Absorbs nicely, moisturizes, but to me, the scent is overwhelming. Its a bit too powerful for my liking. Its nice and high quality though!

title: smells great , very hydrating
body: This lotion is very hydrating and smells great ! It goes on very smoothly and absorbs nicely leaving my skin super soft and smooth .

title: Deep body moisturizer with lasting softness and hydration
body:
This Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Body Cream is one of the best moisturizers I‚Äôve ever used for my body ‚Äî it‚Äôs so soft, creamy and luxurious. It isn‚Äôt a surface level moisturizer for sure ‚Äî this provides lasting hydration and softness.

I like the light pine scent although I did have to get used to it as the ‚Äúfloral‚Äù part of the scent doesn‚Äôt seem to blend well with the pine scent to me. It doesn‚Äôt linger and I do enjoy the freshness of the scent more now. My right elbow got really rough after recuperating from a surgery and spending a lot of time leaning on it in bed watching shows. üòä I applied moisturizers, oils, etc. and nothing really helped until I got this cream. I put it on every night after showering.

title: Hydrating formula that absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy layer! Nice, delicate scent too
body: I love the fresh scent of this body lotion! The texture of the lotion is great; very creamy and hydrating. It also absorbs nicely into the skin, and after a few minutes, I don't feel any residual greasy layer left behind. The scent is also light enough that it doesn't bother me -- and I'm particularly sensitive to scents (my nose AND my skin), so that's saying a lot. I didn't have any irritation after using this lotion, which means it's delicate enough for sensitive skin. A really nice body lotion!

title: YES! Unbelievably good ‚Äì feels extremely high-end.
body: This is one of the best body moisturizers I‚Äôve used, and I‚Äôve tried many throughout the years. It has a silky-smooth texture and feels sufficiently nourishing without being sticky or greasy or taking too long to sink in. The scent is just divine. Personally, I‚Äôm very adverse to overly sweet scents and find them quite sickening. This moisturizer isn't very sweet and smells like a pine forest - I really can‚Äôt get enough of it. It‚Äôs one of the few free Vine products that I will order again at full price once I run out. It's expensive, but not more so than other high-end moisturizers. The texture, scent and feel of this moisturizer on my legs after shaving is just perfect.

title: Subtle scent
body: I'm sensitive to strong smells, so I was glad the scent of this wasn't overwhelming. It says lotion and body wash, so I've been using it in the shower, and it seems to work quite nicely. I have a tendency to have dry skin, and my skin feels nice and plump enough right now.

title: Like a Spa Treatment
body: This Beauty of Joseon] Pine Grove : Body Cream is wonderful. It goes on so smoothly and feels moisturizing immediately. I have dry skin and feel that it really does penetrate deep into all the layers. I love using this after a shower but before toweling dry completely, it seems to soak in even better. Even hours after application, my skin feels very nice. Even though I'm not usually big on pine scent, this is very light and quite refreshing. Excellent cream.

title: Great!
body: The Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Body Cream is a luxurious cream specifically formulated for the body, featuring the refreshing scent of pine groves. It offers nourishment and hydration, leaving the skin feeling smooth and rejuvenated.

title: Beauty of Joseon] Pine Grove : Body Cream
body: If you love woodsy scents, then you will love the scent of this body cream. It definitely leans more on the masculine side, but that won't stop me from using it. It sinks in super fast, meaning it doesn't leave behind the unpleasant greasy feeling, and it makes my skin feel so soft.

title: Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Body Cream
body: Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove body cream is creamy, and it's also lightweight. It absorbs nicely and it doesn't leave a greasy feel after I've applied it. It makes my skin soft and smooth. It also has a really nice scent.

title: Great cream!
body: This cream smells really nice and smoothing. It‚Äôs the perfect texture for body cream and makes my skin feel really moisturized and soft. It‚Äôs really lightly scented without being underwhelming. Love it!

title: Lingering smell of artificial perfume
body:
This body cream came giftable and sealed. The container gives a clean look and contains rich cream.
The problem is the smell that makes it unusable for me. When I first tried it on my hand, it smelled nice and I even did not know it had artificial fragrance. 5 minutes later, that nice scent has completely gone and some cheap perfume smell started bothering me. That's when I read the ingredients on the box and realized there listed a perfume.
Before I ordered, I did read the product description which I found totally misleading. When it said "Pine Grove Scent (Concentration 0.5%)", it sounded as if they were natural scent. Turned out that was not the case.
Even after multiple times of washing, the smell was still too strong and gave me a headache.
It was horrible and I would not recommend it to anyone.

title: Very nourishing
body:
I was impressed with this because it actually doesn't feel greasy or like it just would sit on top of your skin for a long time. It actually soaks in super easily even if you applied a good portion in one spot, it just absorbs without that greasy and heavy feel at least for me. That's a big win of course as I dislike going to bed feeling all oily everywhere with things sticking onto me.

The scent is surprising but I guess as the name would describe it to be. It is very woodsy and pine like. I'd imagine it actually would suit a man nicely but I do see this still being unisex too. Overall, it's got lovely ingredients and definitely has been helpful for my dry skin!

title: Amazing smell and lather
body: I know it‚Äôs detailed as being earthy but they should update the fragrance because this doesn‚Äôt give earthy as much as it gives woodsy. I liken this to a santal or sandalwood. Either way it‚Äôs lovely and very moisturizing.

title: A Little Goes A Long Way!
body: This product smells great, lathers up nicely and leaves my skin feeling smooth and silky. Fair warning, the pump is very powerful so be careful when using the pump otherwise you‚Äôll have too much product coming out at once. The scent seems powerful at first but after you rinse and dry off the scent is there but it isn‚Äôt overpowering or overwhelming. It is a mild pine scent.

title: hydrating body wash
body: This body wash has a light fresh scent. It has a watery texture but it lathers well. The scent is not very strong so you can't really smell it during the shower so it feels scentless for the most part. What I like about this body wash is that it feels very moisturizing. My skin feels very clean and smooth afterward. I did feel like I had to use more of the body wash because of the watery texture so I didn't think it was a good value for a body wash, however, it really feels like a good quality body wash so this is the case where quality trumps quantity.

title: Silky gentle and effective
body: Love BOJ products and this one does not disappoint either. I have been using Pyunkang Yul shower gel and it‚Äôs really great, but BOJ feels creamier a more concentrated. It does have some fragrance but it‚Äôs slight. I am loving it and would recommend it.

title: Packaging issues
body: The bottle came broken. Love this product but crappy delivery packaging.

title: Lovely aroma
body: Smells so amazing, not overpowering

title: Not pine-y
body: Smells really good, even high quality, but flowery. Not really piney. Going to return it.

title: Wonderful
body: This wash is light and non stripping, but gets the job done. This left my skin feeling great, and it built a good lather. My skin felt soft after use, and made the shower smell lovely.

title: Gorgeous
body: Beautiful herby scent. Moisturizing without feeling sticky or like there‚Äôs a residue. Love it!

title: Love the smell
body: Smells like a pine forest. Love it!

title: Pine Grove body wash
body: This is actually a very nice body wash. I wasn't exactly sure what to expect. The scent is extremely light in the pine department. It's very slight, but then there is a floral note to it. It is a unique scent and smells quite pretty. It's not super strong or overly fragrant, but it is a light scent and not too light. It is a little bit on the liquidy side and the pump is a little funky to use in that it kind of squirts it out in an odd fashion. But it is very nice wash and it lathers up very well.

title: Good soap but not a fan of the smell
body: This is a really good soap and it lathers great with just a couple pumps but it more of a piney woodsy smell for a man

title: Didn't love the scent.
body: This scent was not great in my opinion, it was not super strong but not not there either. It just didn't feel like it had enough of something.. can't really pin point it but something felt off for me.

title: Expensive
body:
I have just started using this so I will not be able to tell if this is really helping with anti aging.

It is a nicely packaged, pine scented body wash. Packaging, pump is nice, ingredients are correctly listed.

My only complain is the price. The current $25 includes shipping, but I would say that unless you are looking for product exactly matching the parameters of this one, you can find reasonable body washes in your local store for much cheaper (of course, without shipping).

title: Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Body Wash 13.52 oz
body: A product of Korea this body wash has a complex but subtle earthy pine scent that is suitable for all users. The 13.52 ounce manual pump plastic bottle nozzle has a broad base so even with slippery hands it operates reliably although the texture is thin. It could be an issue with just the bottle I received but the body wash squirted out with intensity so keep hand or mesh loofah close to the spout to avoid inadvertently wasting the product. The body wash lathers and rinses well and does not leave skin feeling tight and dry‚Äîand the scent is excellent.

title: Nice pleasant fragrance
body: Lathers well with a loofah. Pleasant smell that is light. Lingers for a couple of hours. Cleans well without drying the skin. But price/value is not compelling at all. Many brand name body washes with essential oils are available to try out before splurging 25$.

title: Thin and pricey.
body: I have heard people hype up this brand. Maybe other products are better. But I felt this Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove : Body Wash was just average. The body wash has a thinness to it much more so than other body washes I have used. I am not a fan of strong pine scents and this one luckily didn‚Äôt smell like a pine forest or holiday tree. Can‚Äôt quite pin down the actual scent though. This body wash does lather some and will do what a body wash does‚Ä¶get you clean. But it will also clean out your wallet as it is pricey for what it is. I can buy 2 or 3 other brands that work just as well or better for cheaper.

title: I really like it
body: Smells really good and leave my skin feeling great. A little pricey for my taste but over really great body wash.

title: Smells great!
body: Love the smell of this body wash. Lathers well. Skin feels soft. Not digging the price point though.

title: smells nice
body: The body wash had a pleasant woodsy scent. It had a generous lather and it didn't dry out my skin. The body wash washed out cleanly and left my skin feeling soft and hydrated. I love how big the bottle was and the minimalist vibe it had.

title: Rich lather and great earthy fragrance
body:
I really enjoy using this body wash. For the price and quantity, I was expecting that it had to be really impressive. When using it, I can really feel a difference between this versus other body washes. It produces a really rich lather and using a wash cloth or loofah is a better option. It feels like it thickens up more if you used it with it and takes more effort to apply everywhere. When washing, it feels like it cleans well while not stripping the skin dry. It's a luxurious feeling during and after showering. I'm really surprised that it is able to help remove dead skin and help with better skin.

In addition, the earthy fragrance smells great and can work for both men and women. Overall, I'm very impressed with this product.

title: Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Body Wash...
body: I really like this Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Body Wash. It came in a tape-sealed box, and in a plastic, push-down spout dispenser bottle. (I have to be careful with the dispenser, as it comes out with a good bit of force that I wasn't expecting the first time.) The body wash has a wonderful pine scent, the subtle kind, like Christmas trees, not artificial-smelling. This also lathers extremely well, cleans well, and leaves a nice pine scent on my skin. At the current $25 price, it is more expensive than I would normally spend on myself, but I'd totally put it on my wishlist and would love to receive it as a gift. This is made in Korea.

title: I really like this body wash, Great Scent, A Little Costly
body: This is a very nice body wash. I really like the piney smell and how much it lathers. I definitely feel clean and fresh after using it. It is very liquidy and unfortunately the pump is a little too aggressive so if you are not careful you lose have of what is pumped out as it ricochets off your hand. At $25 a bottle, that is a little painful. Great body wash, but pretty steeply priced.

title: Smells Nice
body: Got this for my husband because pine is one of his most favorite scents and he loves it. The scent is exactly what he likes and it‚Äôs not too overpowering. He says it is a little on the thinner side for a body wash, but it lathers well and helps his skin feel soft and moisturized. He will definitely keep using this.

title: [Beauty of Joseon] Pine Grove : Body Wash
body: This is a really nice body wash. I can definitely recommend it. The scent is very subtle, clean, and fresh. It lathers up really well with my loofah and washes away with ease. I feel very clean and it doesn‚Äôt dry out my skin, however, I do put body lotion on within 15 minutes of taking a shower. It comes packaged in a box so less worry about it getting damaged in shipping and the pump works really well, a little too well, as the body wash is kind of thinner, it really shoots out of the pump.

title: Goes far
body:
This lathers up pretty good and is easy to spread over your whole body without needing to use a ton. The smell is nice - it's no overwhelming and it doesn't stick to you, so you can wash off and move on without worrying about some scent clinging to you. It's a pretty nice body wash, and there's a good amount of it so it could last a while.

I don't know if it added a lot of moisture to my skin, but it also didn't dry it out (I have naturally pretty dry skin).

title: Smooth woody scent
body: Upon opening, I was a bit surprised at the strong scent but after using it, I really enjoyed the woody scent. It was refreshing and makes me look forward to the next time I‚Äôm going to use it. It lathers well with my loofa and I am able to use two pumps for my entire body. My skin is soft and not over drying. I have fairly sensitive skin and this product did not cause any irritation. Great product!

title: Smells somewhere between a spa and a man
body:
Review of Body Wash
Despite the pump‚Äôs fat appearance, it is a traditional pump not a foaming one; a single push squirts out a generous dose.
The scent is a very earthy woodsy one that lingers like a cologne. It smells somewhere between a spa and a man.
My skin doesn‚Äôt feel moisturized after using this body wash, but it does not feel stripped either. Just clean.
Very pleasant experience. Comes in a generous size that also won‚Äôt take up a lot of space in the shower. Happy bathing!

title: Smells great while being gentle on skin
body: This body wash smells amazing - the "woody pine" name of the scent is really spot on. It smells like the essence of the best smelling woods I've ever hiked through was captured and made into a soap (the irony being, when I'm in the woods, I usually smell terrible). What's even better is how fragrant this soap is while still being very gentle on the skin. I have very sensitive and easily irritated skin, but my skin felt soft and not at all itchy or dried out after using this. Would 100% recommend.

title: Great aroma and a feel good gentle body wash
body: This body wash has a nice woody smell. Pine is said to relief stress and that's how this aroma instills. Using a wash cloth, this body wash suds up nicely to fine foam. It feels gentle on the skin yet rinse off cleanly. My skin feels soft and my mood relaxed after a shower. Really a great body wash. Recommend for someone who wants to pamper themselves or gift to someone to be pampered!

title: Clean earthy scent of pine and flowers is calming and addictive
body:
This is a simply packaged bottle of silky cleansing body wash that lathers well and rinses clean.
The scent is strong with pine dominating and then the subtle fragrance of fresh flowers filters through.
The pump bottle is easy to use but dispenses a huge amount.
I am a fan of the beautiful scent and how well it lathers as a little goes a long way and cleanses my skin leaving it feeling moisturized.

title: Fresh and clean
body: The fragrance of this is lovely, and IMHO unisex. Just lightly green and subtly piney or mossy, and a touch of rain, like walking through a wooded Glen during a sunshower. Not intensely scented at all, but really pleasant. Lather is luxurious without feeling soapy or oily, but with no drying either. Skin just feels like me without anything added, which is really nice. Very light and clean and slightly invigorating. Very happy, and want to try other scents of this line.

title: Earthy, Beautiful Scent!
body: I ADORE this body wash for a number of reasons. First, it lathers beautifully! Second, it washes away without leaving a slippery residue or film behind. Third, it smells excellent! It has an almost herbal/earthy undertone to it. It smells really good! I love how it leaves my skin feeling and looking. Would recommend, especially at the price point of under 20 dollars.

title: Great scent, good lather, rinses clean.. good overall body wash!
body: This body wash has a nice pleasant pine tree scent, not too powerful and stays on for awhile. The lather is rich and foamy, and most important for me easy to rinse off, no residue, leaves you clean and fresh. If I had any complaint, it would be that the selling price ($25 when I ordered) is a tad high for the amount you get.

title: Body wash
body: Oh the smell of this is great and it leaves your skin feeling extra soft.

title: Great stuff;
body: Love the scent, obviously piney but also somehow elegant and complex. And the scent does linger nicely too, on your skin and it the bathroom. Beautiful packaging too.

title: Amazing scent
body: I was pleasantly surprised! This smells heavenly but earthy at the same time.

title: Versatile and layerable; My complexion has never looked better
body:
I want to say that I truly love these products. My skin's been relatively decent forever but my hormones have been terrible lately. I woke up and it was almost like my skin's barrier was gone and I kept getting cystic acne. For reference, I'm 26, and this was completely out of the blue. However, I've always had overly red cheeks (not rosacea but just thin skin), I thought maybe there'd be WAY to change that. Nope! The Glow Deep Serum and the Calm Serum changed the game! My face is evening out by the day. And the GLOW. I told my best friend, "I literally wear a full face of makeup every day of my life and I truly love my skin and I feel like I really almost don't need it. This is CRAZY."

First pic: No Makeup the lip product is a lip mask from Bath and body works
Second Pic: Makeup but you can see the glow from underneath AND you can see how hydrated my skin is and the texture improving. Unfortunate I didn't take any pictures when my skin was dying but. YES. get this.

My full routine:

Double Cleanse:
- Beekman 1802's Milk Wash Exfoliating Jelly (Cleanse alone with this and if you have sensitive skin you will fight me later. My skin hated me at first until I combined the Cetaphil but it wasn't nearly as bad as aveeno's "sensitive" skin line. That brand and facewash is TERRIBLE.
- Cetaphil Gentle Cleanser (My fav and so cheap)
Toner:
-The Saem "Drop Be" (Purchased when I went to Busan last winter but you can find it on Ebay)
Serums: I use all four of these- I introduced two then four at a time to address problem areas.
Face Mask:
-Mediheal ( My favorites are the Collagen ones and the WaterMide as they don't irritate my sensitive AF skin at all)
Eye Mask:
-Florence (the purple ones for undereye bags) Absolutely obsessed because I have terrible
undereye bags thanks to genetics. The definitely help with puffiness and discoloration. I've been using them for months now.
Lip scrub/Lip Mask:
-Bath and body works vanilla (so good I want a different one though since I like brand exploration but it's SO hydrating and it is great for a no-makeup clean girl look)
Barrier Cream/Skin life changer x2:
-ETUDE Soon Jung 2x Barrier Cream Hypoallergenic

title: Love Love Love
body: I loved all of these serums, they're all lightweight and easy to layer depending on your skin's needs. They're gentle but effective. I liked that they all came in a set to try them all out and I liked them all enough that I bought them all in the full size and use them everyday. My skin is sensitive and acne prone and these have not irritated by skin one bit nor caused any breakouts. None of them are oily at all! So far, everything I have tried from this brand has been a total hit!!

title: WOW
body: These serums are so so so good. I love skin care and am always trying new brands and products, very experienced and cosmetology licensed. I love these. The way the main ingredient in the products are the first or second listed is excellent. The price is a great way to try these, and they have a gorgeous texture. No silicones yet glide on as if they do. From the ingredients it appears they are not full of fillers at all. Great texture yet absorb quickly, leaving your skin feeling plumped. I've noticed a big change in my pore size and blackheads which is my biggest skin concern. The first couple of weeks I didn't notice a change but then all of a sudden it was like night and day. Will be purchasing large bottles of these. The one I can do without is the green serum for redness, I do not have that as an issue so I will not be purchasing that one. I also bought the rice milk toner and love it as well. I am very interested in trying the eye serum and the masks. Great brand, this has sold me.

title: Really like this sample kit!
body: This kit gives me a chance to try different things before I spend too much money on things that do not work. I have nothing negative to say about any of the samples. My skin has clarity that I did not have before. I am still in the process of finding which one I like the most. They are all good and non-irritating to my skin.

title: Great product
body: Wow! These really work I feel my skin clearing and getting softer and rejuvenating my skin barrier! Bottles are tiny but you get 4 different variations. Value definitely worth it. title: Good but not Great
body: All of these serums worked and I loved them. But I believe that there are much better serums out there than these. In this kit, the serums actually come very small and are used fairly quickly. Most of them are very great for sensitive skins and work well with texture and acne but there are much better serums that treat the same things that these do. I would use these if your just getting into skincare but if your looking for specific serums to treat specific things these are a waste of your time and money. They do all smell great though and have a great consistency and weight on the skin.

I got so many compliments and people who hadn't seen me in months asked what I was doing because my skin looked amazing. I wish I had done before and after pictures because this stuff is AMAZING!!!! title: I recommend the trial size but I will not be buying full size bottles.
body: My skin is in very good condition but it is sensitive. I must be careful about the products I buy so that my skin will be free from irritation. Two of the bottles had oils that were too harsh, and two were just so so. I liked the small travel size so I could test the oils inexpensively. None of the bottles had oils that enticed me to buy a full size bottle. I am seeking a trial size Joseon sunscreen.

title: It's ok...
body:
Well, at first I tried the glow serum and really liked it and it seemed to have done some good effects on my face. Then a couple days later I tried the snail serum and the next day I had SO many closed comedones all over my face! At first I thought it was just something I had ate, but then I researched it and found out it was closed comedones (basically where oil and dirt get trapped under your pores and create bumps). Plus I never break out from food.
And it took almost a week to get rid of it.
So I suggest you buy them separately...and the size well it's super tiny so yeah.

title: Serum Sample Packs‚Ä¶good way to tell what not to order
body:
I bought the Beauty by Joseon Serum Discovery Kit and I am glad I didn't spend the money on the larger individual ones. My take on the four included are: 2 out of three of them are very sticky and feel terrible on the skin. I would absolutely pass on the Glow Deep Serum because of the tacky sticky grossness of it. I dont care how good it is, it never absorbs and just sits on top of your skin. The second worse was the Revive serum, it was also very sticky and never really dries or absorbs into the skin.

The two that I liked were the Green Tea and Panthenol as well as the Glow Serum with Propolis and Niacinamide. The green tea one absorbed nicely into the skin. The regular glow serum with propolis and Niacinamide was also pretty nice. It had a little bit of a tacky feeling but absorbed nicely into the skin after a little while.

None of them broke me out or made my skin turn red with a patch test on my arm. I would reorder the ladder two. None of them had much of a smell at all either which I really liked. I cant stand fragrances so that was a plus.

title: Happy with this purchase
body: Each small bottle is enough to last about two months. The glow serum is really good. Happy to try all four and then order my favorite in a larger size.

title: Serums but no label on what they are

title: Seem to work

Doesnt bother my skin at all. The bottle size is good for an example size. Can't wait to try all of them before purchasing the big bottle.

title: serums that work
body: I love this serum discovery kit! This is my year of skin care product discovery/testing, as I have mature combination skin with hyperpigmentation and texture issues I'm trying to "fix". This variety pack is perfect as one's skin is not always looking or feeling the same day in and day out. Based on the weather, your activities and your environment your skin may need different things to soothe it. This has 4 different serums, all can be used together, or at different times, and left my skin feeling and looking great. Used now for a little over a month, so these serums although in small containers, will last a long while. Will be purchasing more products from this brand in the future as I'm very happy with these serums.

title: Meh

No pros but a con was it is slightly sticky to the touch. Sometimes I would wear alone and it didn't feel right because of the stickyness. It is better when worn under moisturizer.

title: Good for travel but smaller than expected
body: The serum kit is great for travel, but I did find the sizes a bit smaller than I expected. While they‚Äôre perfect for short trips, they might not last as long for daily use over time. However, the variety of serums is still a nice way to try out different products without committing to full sizes. Overall, it‚Äôs a convenient and compact set, just a bit smaller than anticipated.

I‚Äôve gotten so many compliments on my skin even after 1 week of using it & now I feel confident going out without wearing makeup

Calming Serum - AM antioxidant after toner
Glow Serum - AM after Calming Serum
Revive Serum - PM after toner
Glow Deep Serum (Hydroquinone) - PM after tretinoin; Use every night for 3-4 months then Slowly wean off for 6 months

title: Great purchase before buying full size!
body:
I was having trouble deciding which Beauty of Joseon serum would be best for my routines so I purchased this small set to test out. I am happy I did because I was able to hone in on some favorites and purchase the full size. The bottles are small, 10 mL, but it‚Äôs more than enough to test out for a few days to get a feel for the product.

My favorite was the Glow - Propolis, I will purchase a full size of that as well as the Revive and Calm serums to switch off and use AM/PM as I see fit. All were well formulated, didn‚Äôt cause any irritation, no scent, a quick absorbing formula, and left my skin looking glowy and hydrated.

body: These serums are one of the most beautiful skincare products I‚Äôve ever used.

title: I am a lover of things pine and forest-like
body: When I first sprayed this perfume, I was thrown off by the powdery and alcohol smell it gave off. This made me nervous for what was to come after this faded away, but when it did, the scent was lovely. I could smell the point, as well as other elements within the perfume. It was forward but gentle in scent and carries well through the day. I am a lover of things pine and forest-like, and this gives a wonderful reminiscence of just that. It's light but delivers well. I even got a few compliments on this my first time wearing it. The scent is not feminine or masculine, it is quite neutral. I will be repurchasing this when I am through with my bottle. Side note, this pairs wonderfully with the body wash and cream.

title: Overall good fragrance
body:
Like a lot of other reviews said, this fragrance definitely gives off a bit of a powdery scent and isn't as intensely pine-scented as I would have expected. Nevertheless, it is a wonderfully light and soft scent that is floral-focused with woody notes of pine and sandalwood. It could be gender-neutral but I definitely get a more feminine vibe from it.

Definitely a lovely scent and does evoke the imagery of a pine grove in bright sunlight. I will use and enjoy this product but likely won't purchase it again unless it goes on sale (which is why I bought it in the first place) Love BoJ products and will be shopping with them again for my skincare needs!

title: Powdery scent, not very pine-y
body: I wouldn't purchase it again, but it's fine. It's not my favorite.

title: PINE STRAW
body: Do not recommend. I thought this would smell nice and woody it‚Äôs smells like mash pine straw in a bottle. It‚Äôs not a good perfume to buy on a whim.

title: Fav perfume
body: My absolute favourite perfume ever.

title: Pretty
body: I really like how this perfume smells. It's nice, light, and unique. It's described as a pine scent, which I can pick up on when I first spray it, but it fades into a more perfumey, floralish scent. I normally don't like perfumey or floral but there's something different about this one. It's comforting and pleasant. The different notes work really well together and it definitely isn't something that'll leave you smelling just like every other woman in the room, it's different (in a good way!) It is a K product and I can't read anything on the box itself, so I'm only going on what the description page says that the notes are. It lasts a decent amount of time on my clothes and skin and I like how as it fades, it smells different.

title: Too powdery
body: It has a nice scent of forest but is too powdery.

title: Not For Me
body: I found the scent of Pine Grove Teeshell Portrait perfume to be very strong, and I personally don't care for it.

title: This smells good
body: This perfume has my favorite scents. The top notes are bergamot, pine, and eucalyptus. The middle notes are lavender, lotus, and rosemary. And the base notes are cedarwood and musk. This is fairly long lasting (a few hours) and is not overpowering. I like an elegant glass bottle. Receive compliments on this light floral scent. The main complaint is the scent isn't too strong for the price of $45. Other than that, I am completely satisfied.

title: Woody fragrance, doesn't last too long
body: This fragrance is true of the pine groves. Initially when I sprayed it, I didn't really like the fragrance that much but after a few minutes the fragrance was more soothing and a woody fragrance. It is not too strong but overall pleasing. One concern is that the fragrance doesn't last very long. In a few hours of spraying it, I could barely smell it. Considering the price, it is a bit expensive for short lived fragrance.

title: Nice Fresh scent
body: The scent reminds me of walking in a pine forest for sure. It is a soft clean smell. The scent last throughout the day. I don‚Äôt see myself wearing it much personally, but I will use it to touch up the living room or maybe a bedroom because of its clean smell so I find it more functional as a room spray.

title: Ok Overall
body: I wasn't a big fan of this scent for myself or my partner. It doesn't project very well and seems to work better as a room spray or for fabrics vs. direct skin.

title: Strong if not overpowering
body:
If you are a fan of incense, this might be for you. I, and my daughter, cannot pinpoint the slightly off smell but overall, it has an earthy, forest-like smell.

A little disappointing.

title: Different
body: While the perfume is not my preference it smells nice.

title: Complex scent, not Pine Tree!
body: First of all, I think the name gives the wrong impression as this is so much more than a so called pine grove! This, even when first applied is not piney, to me at least. Complex, kind of powdery, green earthy. I wish I could describe this adequately because it really deserves better description than mine! Even my husband couldn't pick out one particular note. I find it subtle and haven't worn enough to judge how long it lasts. Like it but does it deserve cost? Don't know that yet :)

title: it's pretty nice
body:
this starts out with a strong, powdery pine scent that quickly fades into a more floral note, vaguely reminiscent of a bouquet, but without being too flowery and still retaining a kind of woodsy scent. I think this is a pretty gender-neutral fragrance.

I probably wouldn't get this again purely because it's not quite the kind of scent I like, but others I had smell it said they liked it.

this seems like it'd be great for gifting; the packaging made this very presentable.

title: Musky up front with a light woody floral finish
body: It‚Äôs a nice earthy scent. I was not sure what to think at first. It has a very musky scent right when you spray it on but soon mellows out. After it sits for a few minutes it does change to a soft earthy floral scent. It‚Äôs a mild scent that definitely can be unisex. It has a nice combination of musk and floral pine scents.

title: Powdery with pine undertones
body:
As others have mentioned, this perfume is much more powdery when you first smell it! It has a light pine/forest undertone, but the overall impression isn‚Äôt what I‚Äôd expect from a scent with this name.

It‚Äôs not unpleasant, just less woodsy than you might imagine. I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs pretty unisex, but not spicy.

The bottle is an elegant glass so it looks nice displayed and feels quality.

title: powdery
body: this scent is so unique, ive never smelled anything like it. you get the pine immediately but then the powder comes through pretty heavy. but its a wonderfully done powder. not grandma smelling. just sweet and pretty pine. i was worried id smell like pinsol, but the smell is far from. its more sweet than anything. i think its a pretty spring time fragrance. probably my new go to

title: Not my favorite
body: This scent smells exactly like described until it settles and dries and then the pine scent disappears. It‚Äôs pretty strong and did give me a headache, but only because I‚Äôm not too fond of this cologne scent once it‚Äôs settles. I feel this a more of a fall/winter scent and I don‚Äôt see myself wearing it at all as a spring/summer scent. The packaging was simple yet elegant

title: Well packaged scent
body: This scent comes beautifully packaged, making it a great gift. I was not wild about the scent, and hey review team- why do you ask how the flavor of a perfume is? I really hope people aren‚Äôt drinking this! It‚Äôs for scent only!

title: Too earthy and woody for my liking
body:
- Upon spraying this perfume for the first time i was immediately repelled. It came off really strong and sharp. The eucalyptus note at the opening combined with pine note reminded me of an essential oil but not in a good way. I generally like bergamot note in perfumes but unfortunately i did not pick up this note in this perfume.
- The dry down is a tad too earthy and woody for my liking. Sadly i just don't like how the eucalyptus note lingers in the dry down and mixes with the base notes. It throws me off.
- The longevity is also not great. It lasts about 2 hours on me.
- Smell is subjective so even if this didn't work me it might work for you especially if you like the smell of eucalyptus and woody and earthy notes in general.

title: I Guess it Depends on What You Like
body:
To me it smells like baby powder and woods.
It wasn't for me, but maybe someone else might like the scent.

Also the scent didn't last long on the skin

title: Its quite a floral blend. The pine is a bit more of a background. Very interesting mix
body:
So I pretty much always give perfumes a 5 star since everyone has their own preferences. Its quite a mix of flowers minus the 'rose' that seems to be popular trend now. In my book this is a plus since I'm not a fan of 'rose' perfumes.
Its quite a balanced multi flower floral scent. Very natural smelling. The pine is an interesting background addition that if you pay attention you can notice it. Its like standing in a flower field next to a pine forest.

Very summer leaning for sure. Feminine mixed floral is how I would describe it. Worth a try if you are really into florals. Longevity seems to be about 5 hours on skin or a day+ on your clothing.

title: Smells real good
body:
Teeshell portrait is an enchanting fragrance that truly captures the essence of elegance and sophistication. The fragrance is perfect for any occasion, whether it's a casual day out or a formal event. The scent is not overpowering, making it perfect for those who prefer a subtle fragrance. The unique combination of scents will definitely make heads turn and leave a lasting impression.

What's great about this perfume is that it is versatile and suitable for both men and women. Its unique blend of scents makes it a perfect choice for anyone who wants to feel confident, elegant, and sophisticated. The elegant glass bottle also adds a touch of luxury to your perfume collection.

Its unique blend of scents, elegant packaging, and versatile nature make it a great addition to any perfume collection.

title: Earthy Fragrance
body: The Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Eau de Perfume comes in a simple and attractive, 1-ounce bottle. Not being a perfume connoisseur, my description is non-technical ‚Äì I enjoy earthy scents, and this fragrance has a nice mix that reminds me of being outdoors. Overall, a pleasant fragrance and nice for gifting as well.

title: Nice scent, only need one spray
body: I haven't used scents so much in the past but this one I've really enjoyed. I started with a spray on each forearm but I think that was a bit too much for me so I switched to one on my torso in the morning and I really like it. It's enough that I still smell it through my shirt throughout the day but not so much that I feel self conscious about other people thinking the scent is too strong. Definitely recommend.

title: Clean scent
body: Although scent will be very subjective, I love this one. I‚Äôm not a fan of overly sweet or floral fragrances, so this one is perfect. The pine notes definitely come through, but not so much that you smell like a Christmas candle. It‚Äôs clean and crisp, and interacts with my skin well. It lasts almost all day long. This is definitely a new go to!

title: Perfume
body: The scent is great, I personally consider it unisex, pine notes but not overwhelming. Smells very clean and fresh with a hint of mystery. I‚Äôm not a huge scent wearer but I really like this

title: Incredible
body: Great scent. Long lasting but not overpowering. The scent also doesn't change as it fades. Good sized bottle as well. Well worth the price

title: Amazing!
body: This perfume smells incredible and lasts a long time. I haven‚Äôt wanted to wear anything else since I got it. It‚Äôs so light and fresh smelling. I can‚Äôt get enough of it. The bottle isn‚Äôt fancy or frilly. It‚Äôs a nice clean design. I‚Äôm already thinking about ordering more! Highly recommend if you like fresh herbal scents

title: Good stuff
body: I got this to use with my gua sha,I needed somthing that wasn't to expensive,came with a decent amount of product,didn't irritate my skin amd that would absorb and not sit on top of my skin or give me a greedy oily feel and this does all that. It moisturizes decently,dosnt absorb to fast so it's good for the gua sha amd I was suprized with the amount you get for the price and it's also a clean ingredient product which is super important to me as well

title: Not for sentive skin
body: This was nice and glow but it made me break out and it was itchy

title: Fast Absorbing Cream
body: Really nice cream that initially has just enough slip to massage well and then melts into skin leaving it smooth and plump. Very neutral light scent. Large tube will last a long time.

title: Good moisturizer cream
body: Mediocre cream. I expected more thinking that this cream will be better to use it for massage. But I don't know the difference between my regular cream from home

title: Nice!
body: I love beauty of joseon but for some reason I was a bit nervous to try a body lotion, turns out i was nervius for nothing because i liked this product. The ingredients aren't harmful or toxic, there's no intense artificial scent (it kinda smells like plants), it's moisturizing just like any other lotion but not too thick and not too thin and it's easy to work with. It leaves a thin coating on the skin unless you really like it on but this is a product where a little can go a long way.
